Commentary: four to start. Short and wide from Sanjaya, and that's one area you don't want to bowl to Zaman. A thick slash over slip for four. Margin of error reduces to almost nothing when it's short and wide
Commentary_short: Sanjaya to Fakhar Zaman, FOUR runs

Commentary: good comeback. On a length on leg, worked away towards square leg for one. Some definite inswing to the left-hander
big appeal. Only height could save Amin. It's full and straight, swinging back in prodigiously after pitching, beats the inside edge and hits Amin high on the front pad. Probably the right call
Commentary_short: Sanjaya to Umar Amin, no run

Commentary: oops, no, no, no. Can't do that. On a length on leg, worked away with the angle of swing to square leg. Nice soft hands. He has overstepped and Zaman has a freebie to come
Commentary_short: Sanjaya to Umar Amin, (no ball) 1 run

Commentary: a big wind-up and swing but no connection. Full, swinging in, hits Zaman on the pad, one leg bye to short fine leg
Commentary_short: Sanjaya to Fakhar Zaman, 1 leg bye

Commentary: good delivery that. Full outside off, some swing back in. Amin defends tentatively, looking for one. A bit nervous
Commentary_short: Sanjaya to Umar Amin, no run

Commentary: drifts down leg, off the pad down to short fine leg for none. Untidy start from Sanjaya
Commentary_short: Sanjaya to Umar Amin, no run

Commentary: fantastic fielding. Full down leg, worked down to short fine leg, who dives to his right to save four
Commentary_short: Munaweera to Fakhar Zaman, no run

Commentary: good single. Full on leg, worked away towards midwicket for one
quick on the pads, hurtling them in, worked to wide mid-on for one
overpitched on leg, another simple nudge towards midwicket. Good defensive Powerplay bowling
shortens the length slightly, around middle and off, played into the leg side
Commentary_short: Munaweera to Umar Amin, no run

Commentary: just wide of long-off. A bit of air on this, Amin runs down, looking to bludgeon this straight but there is just a bit of spin that takes the outside half and slices over cover. Long-off runs to his right to clean up
good length outside off, punched away to mid-off
Commentary_short: Sanjaya to Fakhar Zaman, no run

Commentary: full around off, Zaman lets his hands loose, right through the line, looking to hit the ball too hard. Some swing takes the ball towards the inside half of the bat, one to deep square leg
a yorker outside off, jammed away by the crease. Zaman calls for one, quality single
wide of midwicket. Zaman looking to hit these balls coming into him through the off side. Definitely wrong options. Full on middle and leg, the ball skews past midwicket for a couple
full and wide outside off, just inside the wide tramline. Well bowled, I love that delivery, such a good defensive option, a free dot ball
Commentary_short: Sanjaya to Fakhar Zaman, no run

Commentary: bad timing. Full on leg, Zaman's wild swing clears midwicket for a couple. Square leg runs around. Zaman has to rely on timing much more than his power
that's just beautiful. Flight around middle, Amin runs to the pitch, gets there and lofts the ball over cover for four. Shot of the evening so far, not many good ones yet
Commentary_short: Munaweera to Umar Amin, FOUR runs

Commentary: fired in on the pads, worked to deep midwicket
too quick again, darted in on the pads, Zaman runs down, misses the ball, hits the pads back to the bowler
Commentary_short: Munaweera to Fakhar Zaman, no run

Commentary: makes room, looking to open the off side, but it's fast and straight. Pushed towards cover for one
another one that is very quick on the pads, nudged to deep midwicket

good option from Zaman, better stop from the fielder running back from square leg. Flat and straight, Zaman stays low and sweeps the ball over square leg. Always just wanted to get the ball over the fielder. Pulled back just inside, think that was Shanaka

Commentary_short: Udana to Fakhar Zaman, no run

Commentary: good length on off, pushed back to the bowler. The perfect delivery to Zaman. Sri Lanka have been excellent so far
Commentary_short: Udana to Fakhar Zaman, no run

Commentary: oh no, that's tripe. Rubbish. Short slow delivery well down leg, Zaman goes after it and pulls past short fine leg's right. Would have been short and wide to the right-hander. Help yourself
Commentary_short: Udana to Fakhar Zaman, FOUR runs

Commentary: full around off, pushed to mid-off where Thisara can't prevent one. Another good single
shortish length around off, dabbed towards point for one. Another good single
powerful hit, but not great timing. Full around leg, smashed to deep midwicket. Deep square leg gets around
lovely bowling. Gets a bit of turn this time. Slow around middle and off, defended back to the bowler
Commentary_short: Gunathilaka to Umar Amin, no run

Commentary: fired in, quick on the pads, clipped past square leg for a couple.
called wide. Short down leg, Amin misses the ball when he is out of his crease. The fielder fumbles the collection. The umpire isn't sure, but stretches his arms out
short on leg, worked to deep midwicket for one
comes charging at Gunathilaka, full down leg, hammered to long-off for one
short again, on the pads again, worked to deep midwicket. Fantastic defensive bowling
hammered! Sees Zaman coming and shortens the length, but Zaman doesn't mind slapping the ball through the line with a cross bat. Smashed past mid-on for four
Commentary_short: Gunathilaka to Fakhar Zaman, FOUR runs

Commentary: strays on the pads first up, worked away towards deep backward square leg. Fine leg runs around to keep Pakistan to one
shortish around off, dabbed towards backward point for a quick single.
a good short ball, digs this in on leg, pulled uppishly to deep square leg. Bad timing again
slingy action, full on middle, almost a yorker. Skewed to point
Commentary_short: Perera to Fakhar Zaman, no run

Commentary: another good bouncer. Pings Zaman on the helmet, hits him and ricochets down to third man for a leg bye. Harried for pace.
Commentary_short: Perera to Fakhar Zaman, 1 leg bye

Commentary: good length around off, shovelled to deep midwicket. Another tidy over
very quick on middle, outside-halved towards the sweeper cover
again looking to hit the ball too hard. Full on leg, Zaman comes charging and hits the ball down to long-on. Just focus on timing, if you're strong, the power will do the rest
driven down to long-on for another single
darted in on the pads, a clip to deep midwicket. Four singles off four balls
a low full toss, Amin gave himself plenty of room before the bowler released. Slapped to long-on

and is that the wicket? Sri Lanka think so, the umpires confer. Think he's gone. Flat outside off, the ball sliding on with the arm. Zaman sees some width, and tries to cut, but is beaten for pace again. The ball misses the outside edge but doesn't miss the outside of off stump. That's Sri Lanka's first wicket. A big 'not out' flashes on the big screen, but that was clearly a mistake. Zaman walks off eventually.
quick on off, worked to deep midwicket for one
flight outside off, Babar straides forward and drives to long-off
can't bowl there. Short down leg, Amin gets in position early and pulls past short fine leg's right. No chance for anyone, well placed
Commentary_short: Pathirana to Umar Amin, FOUR runs

Commentary: shortish around leg, worked to deep midwicket for one
too much flight, overpitched outside off stump, drilled to long-off
short around off, skids on, pushed back to the bowler
Commentary_short: Pathirana to Umar Amin, no run

Commentary: short on leg, worked to deep midwicket for one.
fired in on middle, pushed to long-on. Somehow, the fielder sloppily returns the throw to Gunathilaka, who had ran back from midwicket.
shortish and wide outside off, carved past point for a couple
drifts on the pads, clipped to deep square leg
short around off, pushed back to the bowler.
Commentary_short: Munaweera to Umar Amin, no run

Commentary: 71 after the first 10 overs. Sri Lanka will be happy with that. Short and straight, worked to deep midwicket
sweet timing. A bit of flight around off, Amin runs down to the pitch, gets underneath the length and nails a lofted drive right back over the bowler's head.
Commentary_short: de Silva to Umar Amin, SIX runs

Commentary: shortish and wide, slashed to the sweeper cover
Commentary_short: de Silva to Umar Amin, 1 run

Commentary: short and straight, worked away to deep midwicket
Commentary_short: de Silva to Babar Azam, 1 run

Commentary: smashed. Pathirana drops short, Amin picks the length quickly, rocks back, gets in position early and then swats the pull into the gap between deep midwicket and square leg. Lands just inside the boundary
Commentary_short: de Silva to Umar Amin, FOUR runs

Commentary: short down leg, flicked to deep midwicket
Commentary_short: de Silva to Umar Amin, 1 run

Commentary: a low full toss is drilled down to long-on
Commentary_short: de Silva to Babar Azam, 1 run

Commentary: short around off, sits up for Azam to pull to deep midwicket. Should have hit a gap there
full outside off, skewed down to long-on off the inside half of the bat
full outside off, skids on. Azam stays back and drives to the sweeper cover

fantastic effort from long-off, running in. Flight outside off, Amin makes room and chips the ball towards mid-off. The fielder gets there, but because of his running momentum, he wasn't in a great position to take the catch. Fine effort nonetheless.
driven down the ground for another run
slow and straight, skids on, worked to deep midwicket

good catch from Thisara. Full and straight from Udana, Amin looks to hit the ball straight, but Udana's natural angle brings the ball in to the left-hander, and it may have been an offcutter too. The ball skews off the inside half of the bat, and lobs towards long-on, where Thisara runs to his left, and takes a good catch. Made a tough catch look easy, no diving, no need
Dismissal_text: Umar Amin c Perera b Udana 45 (37b 3x4 1x6) SR: 121.62

Commentary: full outside off, driven to deep cover for one
short and wide outside off, chopped away towards the sweeper cover for one
a low full toss on middle, worked to deep midwicket
short on off and middle, pulled to deep square leg.
and that's four to finish. Full and wide outside off, Azam opens the bat face and carves the ball past point for four.
Commentary_short: Udana to Babar Azam, FOUR runs

Commentary: good length outside off, dabbed towards third man for one
full and straight, worked to deep square leg for one
short around off, chopped away towards point for a quick single
short on middle and leg, well directed bouncer. Azam gets underneath the length and lets it go
Commentary_short: Perera to Babar Azam, no run

Commentary: short outside off, dabbed back to the bowler. That's fine bowling from Thisara, the lines are pretty good
Commentary_short: Perera to Babar Azam, no run

Commentary: good length outside off, punched away to long-on
short on leg, another single to deep square leg. This is just not good enough from Babar, 20 off 18. Maybe Miller fever
terrific yorker, full on leg, jammed back towards mid-on for one
superb from Prasanna. Full and wide outside off, Azam runs down and carves the ball towards cover, Prasanna dives to his left to save some runs
Commentary_short: Sanjaya to Babar Azam, no run

Commentary: full and straight, Azam flicks towards long-on. Another single.
another fine yorker, full on the pads, worked down to fine leg for one. This is fantastic defensive bowling from Sri Lanka
another yorker on leg, nudged to deep midwicket for another single. Just five off it
full and straight, jammed back to the bowler. 22 off 22 now for Azam
Commentary_short: Udana to Babar Azam, no run

Commentary: full and straight, out comes the slog, inside-edged towards square leg for one
that's a poor ball, full outside off, the perfect length for Malik to get underneath and loft the ball over long-off. Plonks just beyond the boundary
Commentary_short: Udana to Shoaib Malik, SIX runs

Commentary: superb shot. Can't keep dishing up length to Malik. Full and wide, Malik gets underneath it and drills a lofted drive over cover
Commentary_short: Udana to Shoaib Malik, FOUR runs

Commentary: that's just fantastic batting. Field manipulation at its very best. There are two points, which means there is a big gap beyond them. Full and wide outside off, Malik bends his knees and brings his bat up from down to hit the ball in the air. He has pierced both fielders for good measure. Shot of the day
Commentary_short: Udana to Shoaib Malik, FOUR runs

Commentary: full outside off, driven to deep cover for one
a low full toss outside off, under-edged towards square leg for one
a high full toss on middle, shovelled to deep midwicket, another couple. Struggling for timing is Azam
full and very wide outside off, but inside the tramline. Terrific defensive bowling
Commentary_short: Perera to Babar Azam, no run

Commentary: full and wide outside off, slashed towards backward point for one
a full toss outside off, quick through the air, punched to deep cover. Superb over so far
full and wide again, this is just outside the tramline for a wide
a thick outside edge races down to the third man boundary. Full and wide, Babar looks to go over cover but gets just the right amount of bat
Commentary_short: Perera to Babar Azam, FOUR runs

Commentary: a low full toss outside off, worked away into a massive gap at midwicket for a couple.
this is just great batting from Malik. A full toss outside off, slashed away through point. There is deep backward point and deep cover. Malik hits it in between them
Commentary_short: Shanaka to Shoaib Malik, FOUR runs

Commentary: a good yorker off the third. On leg, driven to long-on for one
superb yorker, on middle, carved down to third man for one. Not much Azam could do with that

that's terrible fielding from deep midwicket. Allows three extra runs. Thisara is not happy. Anpother full toss from Shanaka, heaved away to deep midwicket, who gets down but allows the ball to go through his legs.
Commentary_short: Shanaka to Shoaib Malik, FOUR runs

Commentary: a low full toss on middle, driven to long-on for one. Didn't quite find his length in that over
full delivery outside off, drilled to long-off for one.
full and straight, another fine yorker, all Azam can do is drive to long-on
right in the gap at cover point. Full and wide from Thisara, Malik gets underneath and slices the ball through cover point
Commentary_short: Perera to Shoaib Malik, FOUR runs

Commentary: full toss outside off, many of these, driven to long-off for one
another low full toss, Azam shovels one down to long-on. This hasn't been a great innings from Azam
great fielding. Full and wide outside off, Malik gets underneath the ball and carves over cover point. The deep cover fielder pulls the ball in, the deep point fielder cleans up.
a low full toss down leg, worked away to deep square leg. This has been a momentum-sucking innings from Babar
very full, another yorker, worked to deep midwicket. Malik races back for the second

gets enough of that. Another full toss, a low full toss, Malik gets underneath the length and lifts the ball over deep midwicket. Not exceptional timing, but enough power. That is also Malik's fifty, sensational innings this has been
Commentary_short: Sanjaya to Shoaib Malik, SIX runs

Commentary: another full toss. This time Malik doesn't get much behind the shot. Heaves it away straight to deep midwicket, who takes a juggled catch.
Dismissal_text: Shoaib Malik c de Silva b Sanjaya 51 (24b 5x4 2x6) SR: 212.50

Commentary: what a shot first up, plus a no-ball. A low full toss outside off, Faheem just powers a lofted drive and he has so much power that it clears deep cover comfortably. A free hit to come too
Commentary_short: Sanjaya to Faheem Ashraf, (no ball) SIX runs

Commentary: another six. What a cameo already by Faheem. Yet another full toss on leg, Faheem swings away and the ball clears square leg comfortably. Maaaaasive. Thisara is not pleased.
Commentary_short: Sanjaya to Faheem Ashraf, SIX runs

Commentary: a good yorker to finish, around off, skewed to deep midwicket and that will be the innings.
flat on the pads to start, worked to deep square leg to get off the mark
shortish and straight, the ball seams back in, defended back
Commentary_short: Imad Wasim to Munaweera, no run

Commentary: swept away to deep square leg. Flat around off, Munaweera stays low and sweeps to deep square leg
hiiigh in the air, and safe. Flat around off, Gunathilaka stays low and sweeps towards deep midwicket, long-on cleans up
short and straight, Gunathilaka backs away and pushes to mid-off, who fumbles and allows the second. Sarfraz has been in better mood
wild swing and four, off the outside edge. Flat outside off, Gunatilaka looks to go straight but the ball hits the outside edge
Commentary_short: Imad Wasim to Gunathilaka, FOUR runs

Commentary: full and straight, the ball seaming back in, inside-edged into the pad, some definite inswing
Commentary_short: Mohammad Amir to Munaweera, no run

Commentary: cleaned up! The ball swings back in, and Munaweera does not account for that. Full outside off, the ball swings back, and Munaweera plays an awful shot, trying to cut, cut inswing?! The ball finds a massive gap and hits off stump. Terrible shot selection
Dismissal_text: EMDY Munaweera  b Mohammad Amir 1 (4b 0x4 0x6) SR: 25.00

Commentary: full outside off, Samarawickrama comes charging and drives through cover for a couple. Pulled inside the boundary
short delivery on the pads, and then off it, towards square leg
Commentary_short: Mohammad Amir to Samarawickrama, 1 leg bye

Commentary: lovely bowling. Full and straight, the ball moving away late, pushed back to the bowler
Commentary_short: Mohammad Amir to Gunathilaka, no run

Commentary: ooh that looked close. Amir goes wide of the crease, gets the ball to pitch and holds its line, Gunathilaka misses a flick and gets struck on the pad.
Commentary_short: Mohammad Amir to Gunathilaka, no run

Commentary: short and straight, worked down to short fine leg
Commentary_short: Imad Wasim to Samarawickrama, no run

Commentary: nice placement. Short and wide outside off, coming in, sliced through backward point for a couple
good length outside off, the ball coming in, worked to midwicket
Commentary_short: Imad Wasim to Samarawickrama, no run

Commentary: short and wide outside off, guided to short third man
Commentary_short: Imad Wasim to Samarawickrama, no run

Commentary: swept to deep square leg, straight to the man. This is my home, I know what I'm doing insinuates Imad to Samarawickrama. Flat and straight, on middle and leg. Samarawickrama shuffles right across and sweeps, but the ball goes straight to the man on the boundary
Dismissal_text: S Samarawickrama c Babar Azam b Imad Wasim 4 (7b 0x4 0x6) SR: 57.14

Commentary: flat and straight, clipped away towards square leg for a run
slow outside off, dabbed towards point. Some hesitation but Udawatte is back
Commentary_short: Mohammad Hafeez to Udawatte, no run

Commentary: short and straight, whipped away through midwicket. A generous amount of whipping through the line of that. Fine, fine shot
Commentary_short: Mohammad Hafeez to Udawatte, FOUR runs

Commentary: flat and straight, clipped to short fine leg

and three down are Sri Lanka! Falling away rapidly. Flat around off, Gunathilaka backs away, looks to hit the ball hard, too hard and the ball goes straight back to Hafeez. It's quick, Hafeez ducks, sticks up his hands and takes a sharp overhead catch. Same ol' tale.
Dismissal_text: MD Gunathilaka c & b Mohammad Hafeez 9 (7b 1x4 0x6) SR: 128.57

Commentary: flat and slow around off, worked towards square leg
Commentary_short: Mohammad Hafeez to Shanaka, no run

Commentary: more hesitation. Short and straight, worked away to square leg for a quick single
oh how has that gone past? Full outside off, just a gentle drive back past the bowler. Mid-off runs to his right but has no chance because of this outfield
Commentary_short: Imad Wasim to Shanaka, FOUR runs

Commentary: nudged to midwicket
Commentary_short: Imad Wasim to Shanaka, no run

Commentary: short and straight, naggingly accurate, nudged to midwicket
Commentary_short: Imad Wasim to Shanaka, no run

Commentary: good fielding from Azam on the boundary. Full around leg, flicked away uppishly towards deep midwicket, Azam stops the ball, but the momentum takes him past the boundary and the ball towards the boundary. As he tries to recover, he makes an unnecessary jump back in, instead of calmly coming back in, but his back foot is in contact with the ball over the boundary
Commentary_short: Imad Wasim to Shanaka, FOUR runs

Commentary: flat and straight, driven to long-on
short outside off, pushed to long-on for one
good length around off, some extra bounce as the ball splices back to the bowler
Commentary_short: Mohammad Amir to Udawatte, no run

Commentary: good length on middle and leg, worked to deep square leg
short around off, defended back to the bowler. Terrific line
Commentary_short: Mohammad Amir to Shanaka, no run

Commentary: a slower ball on leg, played back towards the bowler. No run there
Commentary_short: Mohammad Amir to Shanaka, no run

Commentary: superb shot. Overpitched outside off from Amir, Shanaka opens the bat face and carves a square drive through point. Fantastic placement.
Commentary_short: Mohammad Amir to Shanaka, FOUR runs

Commentary: a slower ball around off, driven towards mid-off for one.
full delivery outside off, chipped away into the cover region
Commentary_short: Faheem Ashraf to Shanaka, no run

Commentary: short down leg, nudged down to fine leg for one
short and wide outside off, some seam movement away, carved towards cover
Commentary_short: Faheem Ashraf to Udawatte, no run

Commentary: good length around off, clipped towards deep square leg for one.
good length outside off, defended to cover for nothing
Commentary_short: Faheem Ashraf to Shanaka, no run

Commentary: short around off, clipped away to midwicket, just one to finish. Very tidy bowling
the googly to start from Shadab, outside off, defended back
Commentary_short: Shadab Khan to Shanaka, no run

Commentary: the slog sweep, well played. Covered the line nicely, got underneath it sufficiently and swept it away over deep square leg for six. That will give them more confidence
Commentary_short: Shadab Khan to Shanaka, SIX runs

Commentary: darted in on leg, clipped towards short fine leg for one
short down leg, worked to deep square leg for one
a flat six. Too full from Shadab, Shanaka stays low and drills a powerful heave over long-on. Lots of power behind that
Commentary_short: Shadab Khan to Shanaka, SIX runs

Commentary: short and wide, spinning away, slashed towards cover
Commentary_short: Shadab Khan to Shanaka, no run

Commentary: short outside off, inside-edged towards square leg
good length around off, inside-edged towards square leg for one more
short outside off, Udawatte picks the length early and wants to dispatch the ball over midwicket but fails to make any contact
Commentary_short: Faheem Ashraf to Udawatte, no run

Commentary: a soft dismissal. Short on middle from Faheem, hurries Udawatte into his pull. He picks the length well but is far too late on his pull, the ball lobs off the splice and settles in midwicket's hands. Faheem has generated some impressive pace
Dismissal_text: ML Udawatte c Babar Azam b Faheem Ashraf 11 (13b 1x4 0x6) SR: 84.61

Commentary: back of a length and on the leg stump, cramps 'em up for room. Poked towards cover off an outside edge
Commentary_short: Faheem Ashraf to de Silva, no run

Commentary: back of a length on the leg stump again, this time Chaturanga slinks away outside leg, manufactures swinging room and carves it away fine of Hasan Ali at deep third man. He slides in the deep and cuts it off. He saves two for the hosts
Commentary_short: Faheem Ashraf to de Silva, 2 runs

Commentary: skids on, full on off stump, whipped with the wrists to long-on
fired outside off, Chaturanga nearly chips it right back to Imad
Commentary_short: Imad Wasim to de Silva, no run

Commentary: shortish and width outside off, Chaturanga steps away outside leg, creates additional room and cracks it through extra cover. Fetch that!
Commentary_short: Imad Wasim to de Silva, FOUR runs

Commentary: skids into the pads, tucked around the corner for a single
Commentary_short: Imad Wasim to de Silva, 1 run

Commentary: tossed outside off, non-turner, driven to cover off the front foot
Commentary_short: Imad Wasim to Shanaka, no run

Commentary: Shanaka forays down the track, this is darted shorter on middle stump. The batsman adjusts and swats the ball aerially to wide long-on
good length down leg, worked down to fine leg
good length around off, outside-halved towards point for one
Commentary_short: Hasan Ali to de Silva, 1 run

Commentary: a good idea, but not very good execution. Short on middle and leg, Shanaka gets underneath the bouncer. Loops over him
good length outside off, edged down to third man
good length down leg, worked towards square leg
Commentary_short: Hasan Ali to de Silva, 1 run

Commentary: fullish delivery around off, defended to point. An unnecessary throw to the bowler's end and Hafeez's untidy backing up at mid-on combine to leave Sarfraz seething
hit away into the off side for one. Hasan Ali ensuring he isn't too full
Commentary_short: Hasan Ali to de Silva, 1 run

Commentary: the googly on leg, worked to deep midwicket for one
Commentary_short: Shadab Khan to de Silva, 1 run

Commentary: smashed for four. SL need a lot more. The seam-up delivery outside off, drilled over the bowler for four. Fantastic hitting
Commentary_short: Shadab Khan to Shanaka, FOUR runs

Commentary: four more. The legbreak outside off, Shanaka gets down and nails a slog sweep nicely into the gap at midwicket
Commentary_short: Shadab Khan to Shanaka, FOUR runs

Commentary: clipped away for a run towards deep square leg
the googly outside off, dabbed into the gap towards midwicket for a run. Long-on is quick on it
Commentary_short: Shadab Khan to de Silva, 1 run

Commentary: wheeeeeeeee, fifty for Shanaka. Legbreak around off, Shanaka stands his ground, brings his bat down and lifts the ball way over midwicket. Right in his wheelhouse
Commentary_short: Shadab Khan to Shanaka, SIX runs

Commentary: full delivery on middle, pushed towards the sweeper cover for one. Good batting.
Commentary_short: Hasan Ali to de Silva, 1 run

Commentary: short delivery around off, pulled away to deep square leg for one
good length on the pads, worked to deep square leg. One more.
Commentary_short: Hasan Ali to de Silva, 1 run

Commentary: superb shot. Shanaka in form. Short delivery around off, pulled to deep square leg for one, all along the ground
short and wide outside off, sliced to the deep point fielder for one
Commentary_short: Hasan Ali to de Silva, 1 run

Commentary: shortish delivery around off, another pull to deep square leg
good length outside off, Shanaka wafts and is beaten.
Commentary_short: Faheem Ashraf to Shanaka, no run

Commentary: is that the match? It's a pressure catch, Imad circles around the catch, and eventually takes it. Full around off, Shanaka swings himself off his feet. Because he wanted to hit the ball too hard, the ball hits the outside half and just lobs to midwicket. Very high in the air, good catch
Dismissal_text: MD Shanaka c Imad Wasim b Faheem Ashraf 54 (36b 5x4 3x6) SR: 150.00

Commentary: short around off, worked to deep midwicket
Commentary_short: Faheem Ashraf to de Silva, 1 run

Commentary: full on middle, a sweetly-timed drive to mid-off. Can't take too long
Commentary_short: Faheem Ashraf to Perera, no run

Commentary: good length delivery around off, carved to the sweeper cover. Just one
gets it past point, but a hand on it from the diving fielder. Good length around middle, sliced towards the sweeper cover
Commentary_short: Faheem Ashraf to de Silva, 1 run

Commentary: flight down leg, swept away to deep square leg for a run
Commentary_short: Mohammad Hafeez to de Silva, 1 run

Commentary: quick on the pads, Thisara misses a flick, struck on the pad
Commentary_short: Mohammad Hafeez to Perera, no run

Commentary: driven away to long-on for one more
short down leg, pulled to long-on. Fine defensive bowling this
Commentary_short: Mohammad Hafeez to de Silva, 1 run

Commentary: quick on the pads, Thisara heaves the ball with all his might to deep midwicket
quick and straight, Chaturanga gets low in an attempt to get underneath the ball enough to lift the ball over short fine leg. He does but gets hardly any connection
Commentary_short: Mohammad Hafeez to de Silva, 1 run

Commentary: short on middle and leg, scythed straight to Imad at point, who throws the ball at the batsman's end. Chaturanga has come down and been sent back. A direct hit would have had the batsman. Sarfraz still says something to Imad
Commentary_short: Mohammad Amir to de Silva, 1 run

Commentary: terrific bouncer on leg, Thisara gets underneath the delivery
Commentary_short: Mohammad Amir to Perera, no run

Commentary: full down leg, thick inside edge into the pad and then towards point. Superb bowling
that should be it for this series. Full and straight, Chaturanga backs away and can't connect with a drive, the ball hits the stumps, the pace took the delivery under his shot. Too good from Amir.
Commentary_short: Mohammad Amir to de Silva, OUT
Dismissal_text: PC de Silva  b Mohammad Amir 21 (20b 1x4 0x6) SR: 105.00

Commentary: full delivery outside off, driven to mid-off. Another dot
Commentary_short: Mohammad Amir to Prasanna, no run

Commentary: a short delivery around off, pulled to deep square leg

full delivery outside off, driven to mid-off. He has timed it so badly that cover runs in, picks up and misses the stumps at the bowler's end with Prasanna diving for his life in front of him. Out had he hit
excellent use of that short ball again. On middle and off. Thisara backs away and bails out of a stroke
Commentary_short: Hasan Ali to Perera, no run

Commentary: smashed in the gap. Short around middle, Thisara backs away and swats a pull between long-on and deep midwicket
Commentary_short: Hasan Ali to Perera, FOUR runs

Commentary: now it's the short slow bouncer. Thisara is lulled into playing earlier than he should, the ball beats his pull
Commentary_short: Hasan Ali to Perera, no run

Commentary: now the yorker. Full around off, driven away towards cover where there is a misfield from Hafeez, who gestures that the ball skidded on.

the back-of-the-hand slower ball outside off, Thisara launches one high in the air, but the ball has not been timed. Much more elevation than distance. Shadab, at long-on, settles easily underneath and takes an easy one. With that, Pakistan should have no further trouble
Dismissal_text: NLTC Perera c Shadab Khan b Hasan Ali 10 (12b 1x4 0x6) SR: 83.33

Commentary: strays on the pads, nudged down to fine leg for one
full delivery outside off, jammed out to mid-off. Amir over-runs it but recovers well
short on middle, pushed to Shadab at cover, who picks up cleanly and misses the stumps at the bowler's end
full and wide outside off, hammered straight to cover
Commentary_short: Faheem Ashraf to Pathirana, no run

Commentary: a slower delivery on middle, driven hard and straight. Mid-off dives to his left, gets down lackadaisically and concedes four
Commentary_short: Faheem Ashraf to Pathirana, FOUR runs

Commentary: short on middle, pulled to deep square leg. Just one
nicely played. Shortish delivery around off, Pathirana stays back and pulls over midwicket. No one there
Commentary_short: Hasan Ali to Pathirana, FOUR runs

Commentary: a slower delivery on middle and off, the offcutter. A thick outside edge down to third man
way over deep midwicket. Another slower ball outside off, this one is picked. Prasanna stays back and creams a pull over the boundary
Commentary_short: Hasan Ali to Prasanna, SIX runs

Commentary: a low full toss on off, drilled down to long-on
a slower ball around middle, chipped to long-on. Just one more
another big six. Fullish outside off, Prasanna swings through the line and the ball soars over midwicket. Not the best way for Hasan Ali to finish this series
Commentary_short: Hasan Ali to Prasanna, SIX runs

Commentary: full delivery on leg, pushed back to the bowler
Commentary_short: Mohammad Amir to Pathirana, no run

Commentary: Hafeez struggles but takes the catch eventually. A slower ball down leg, Pathirana is through his shot too early, the ball is chipped in the air towards midwicket. Hafeez watches the ball, backtracks slightly, juggles, wiggles but takes it
Dismissal_text: SS Pathirana c Mohammad Hafeez b Mohammad Amir 14 (10b 2x4 0x6) SR: 140.00

Commentary: a slower delivery outside off, Prasanna misses his swing, wide called
full delivery outside off, Prasanna's big swing results in a thick edge for Sarfraz, swung himself off his feet. Malik shakes Prasanna's hands. Amir is happy.
Dismissal_text: S Prasanna c †Sarfraz Ahmed b Mohammad Amir 16 (8b 0x4 2x6) SR: 200.00

Commentary: full outside off, another big swing, no connection
Commentary_short: Mohammad Amir to Sanjaya, no run

Commentary: a slowish delivery around off, a big swing again, no bat. Big, wide, flashing smiles all around in the field
Commentary_short: Mohammad Amir to Sanjaya, no run

Commentary: good length delivery on the pads, worked to deep midwicket and that's it. Pakistan complete another whitewash, taking the T20s 3-0
